rootDir.description: Root directory of your program. Defaults to './src'

include.description: List of glob patterns to include in your program. Defaults to ['./**']

exclude.description: List of glob patterns to exclude when resolving `include`. Defaults to []

emitLang.description: Language to compile JS+ into. Defaults to 'JavaScript'

emitDir.description: Directory to compile JS+ into. Defaults to './dist'

emitSourceMaps.description: Emit source maps in the `emitDir`. Defaults to false
